text: Super Junior-M, often referred to as SJ-M, is a Mandopop boy band, under SM Entertainment. They are the first international music group in the Chinese music industry to have members of both Chinese and Korean descent. Super Junior-M is the third subgroup of Super Junior and the most successful. ==Members== ===Current members=== *Sungmin *Eunhyuk *Donghae *Siwon *Ryeowook *Kyuhyun * Zhou Mi *Henry ===Former members=== *Han Geng ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *Me (2008) *Break Down (2013) ===Original Soundtracks=== *Skip Beat! (2012) ===Extended plays=== *Super Girl (2009) *Perfection (2011) *Swing (2014) == References == Category:2008 establishments in South Korea Category:C-pop Category:Hip hop bands Category:Musical groups established in 2008 Category:R&B; bands Category:SM Entertainment artists Category:South Korean boy bands
title: Super Junior-M
